generated_body: If you click on the article titled "The NFL Hot Seat: Sean McVay ran out of magic, and Jared Goff isn't helping," you may expect an analysis of the current challenges facing the Los Angeles Rams, particularly focusing on head coach Sean McVay and quarterback Jared Goff. Additionally, it may explore the implications of these challenges for the Rams' season and potential future strategies as they attempt to regain their former success.
